column4: ok, how about this: I'm fed up with struggling with this, so, can any recommend either a USB wifi NIC or PCMCIA that will work "out of the box" with Gutsy?
anything with an intel chipset seems to work pretty well, i got wpa and everything out of the box.

ok, now, when you say anything with an intel chipset, can you recommend either PCMCIA or USB specifically?  That is, I don't know which has which chipset (though I suppose it will be labeled) and would love a place to start.
i'm not sure, im using a mini pci intel 2200AGN, it worked perfectly
